title: Understanding Currency Format
text: The currency format is more than just adding a dollar sign. It ensures consistency and proper alignment of numbers.

title: Benefits of Currency Format
text: Using the currency format helps in maintaining a professional look and ensures that all monetary values are formatted uniformly.

hintAnswer: the currency format places dollar signs to the left of the number, changing positions based on the number of digits in the cell
title: Exploring the Currency Format
text: What is the main advantage of using the currency format over manually typing a dollar sign?
choices: the currency format places dollar signs to the left of the number, changing positions based on the number of digits in the cell
there is no difference from a regular dollar sign symbol, typed in
it limits characters after the decimal to just one
